text:
@JoeBiden To Joe's Twitter Handler:
I'm not even sure what this Tweet means?? Currently the President has a Coronavirus Task force made up of a panel of the leading Dr's and scientists in their field. But somehow they are basing their science in fiction? Thanks, but POTUS has this covered
